commentary: and now the length ball, nipping in, Green stepping away to thrash it again, but is beaten. Or is he? Saha's gone up in spontaneous appeal and the umpire has given it. Green takes a pause and then reviews. There is a spike as the ball passes bat, and it does look like it took a feather of an inside edge, so Green's entertaining knock ends. Bumrah has some reward at last, having bowled his heart out.

take that says Green. If you bounce me, I'll send you over the fence. And not just that, I'll do it on the front foot to a ball that's homing in on my head. Bumrah banged it in hard and it was rising, but Green hooks it on the front foot over square leg.
what a shot. Stunning execution by Green. This is almost a yorker on the stumps, he's gone on the back foot, cleared his front leg and drilled it straight past the bowler
length outside off, Saha collected it in front of his face. Good carry with the new ball. The batsman was poking at it, luckily for him, doesn't catch the edge
bouncer on the stumps, ducks under it
short outside off, cuts off the back foot to deep point

doesn't time it as well but still gets it over long-on! This was not as full as the previous one, more bottom hand in this as he doesn't get fully underneath. Goes flatter than the last ball but still sails over long-on.

boom. Cameron Green is showing off his hitting power. Full ball on the stumps, goes deep in his crease to go underneath the ball and uses his height and long hands to power through a golf swing waaaay over long-on. That's a shot that's not out of place in the slog overs of a T20 game
full outside off, bends his back leg and punches through cover with excellent timing
fuller on off, looking to drive, gets a thin inside edge that trickles towards leg gully
length outside off, opens the face to steer it to point
back of a length outside off, pushes it between cover and point
length outside off, stays legside of it and steers to backward point
length ball going down leg, doesn't connect with the flick
very full on off, defended back to the bowler
length on the pads, flicked to deep square leg
gone through him. Zips  past the outside edge even as he's looking to drive. Missed the outside edge by a centimetre
bouncer outside off, Green ducks under it
walking across and this one is slipped wide of leg stump, so he can't reach it. An ODI wide
back of a length well outside off, moves across and glides it through backward point
thwack. Disdainfully done. Dances down the track to a fast bowler with a second new ball, makes room and wallops him over deep midwicket with a clean, baseball swing of the bat
flowing drive to one that is on a sixth stump line, confidently on the front foot and leans into it. Rohit at cover dives to his left to stop it
too much room outside off and that is stroked to deep point
length, but well outside off, left alone
inswinger, but down leg. Saha gathers
just past gully. Fuller on the fifth stump again, moving away, and he goes hard at it. Gets a healthy edge and gully can't reach it despite diving to his right. That's a maiden Test fifty for Green
and again, moves it away. But this is a bit too far outside off, so easily left alone
swinging into him now, and he misses the flick as he moves across.
shaping away from him on a fifth stump line, he's drawn into poking at it, goes past the outside edge
length outside off, left alone
moving across the crease, gets another one on the thigh pad that goes to fine leg, as he misses the swat-sweep
straighter one again, and he's happy to pick these off to square leg
length ball on middle and leg, goes inside the line and flicks it with the angle to deep square leg
length on off, straightens a touch after pitching, Green adjusts to defend on the front foot
straighter, ends up on the pads, tries to flick and misses but it pings off the thigh pad to fine leg
length on off, blocked back down the pitch
length on off, tapped back to the bowler
length ball nipping in on off, defended into the offside
yorker length almost on off, stands tall and clips to mid-on
fuller, angling in on off, pushed to mid-off with soft hands and they hustle the quick single
length on off, gets behind it and defends to mid-on
length ball coming in on leg stump, steered to backward point
tapped to midwicket
got a glove on it and it goes very fine. Ashwin still bowling leg-spinners, targetting the rough outside leg stump? But it's well down leg and he sweeps hard, gets enough contact for a boundary
another carrom ball, or was it just a proper leg-break? Tapped towards short fine leg
pushes at it outside leg and gets a thick edge that rolls towards backward point
carrom ball, like a leggie from around the wicket. Goes off the pad to short leg, as he misses the flick
tossed up well wide of leg stump, goes for the sweep, gets a toe end that goes very fine, but slow enough for short fine leg to cut off
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards short midwicket
short of length on middle and leg, tucked past square leg once more, a couple as the deep square leg cuts it off
short of length outside off, swivels and pulls it towards deep-backward square leg
length ball outside off, steered towards gully
short of length around off, defended towards cover
length ball angling in, defended on the leg side
another reverse sweep and much better connection and placement this time, hits it behind point to end the over with a four
slower on the stumps, comes forward and pushes it towards the bowler
fuller on the pads, Paine goes back and pushes it to short midwicket
length ball on the stumps, reverse-swept to point
a carrom ball at the stumps, just defended from the crease
fuller around off, backs away and looks to smash it through extra cover, gets an inside edge past the leg stump
fuller on the stumps, driven but cannot beat mid-on
length ball on middle and leg, turned towards short midwicket
length around off, Paine is once again behind this, blocked
length ball around off, gets behind this one and defends
fuller around off, goes for the drive once again. Not from the middle of the bat but will get a single to extra cover
fuller around fourth stump, Green comes forward to drive but is beaten by the pace
length ball on middle and leg, defended
length outside off, backs away to create room. Cuts it hard through point for another four
fuller on the stumps and a lap sweep this time from Paine. Between the wicketkeeper and short-backward square leg
fuller around off, drives it towards short mid-on
too close to cut, chopped past Rahane at first slip
fuller on the stumps, pushed toward short midwicket
length ball outside off, 140kph, gets a thick outside edge into the ground and Rahane cannot stop it this time
a touch fuller this time from Bumrah, Paine comes on the front foot and drives it through covers
length ball in the channel. A thick outside edge into the ground and to Rahane's left at gully. Good stop

dropped at wide first slip by Rohit. Length ball in the corridor, hard hands from Paine as he pushes at it, gets an outside edge and it goes low to Rohit's left. He gets low, both hands but cannot hold on to
fuller around off, opens the face to work it towards point but no run as the fielder makes a tumbling stop
length ball around off, gets behind it and blocks
uses his feet, reaches to the pitch of the ball and lofts it over midwicket
short of length outside off, backs away and punches it towards point
too full on the stumps, digs it out towards mid-on
uses of feet to this tossed up delivery around off, driven along the ground towards long-on
length ball on middle and leg, flicked towards midwicket
flatter on the leg stump, backs away and defends
length ball on middle and leg, defended

doesn't carry to Vihari at shot mid-off/ short extra cover. Was a short of a length delivery on middle and leg. Looked like it stopped at Green who was trying to work it on the leg side. Gets a leading edge but lands well in front of Vihari
length ball around off, defended towards covers
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards extra cover
length ball in the channel. Looks to run it fine and gets beaten
fuller around off, driven back towards the bowler
length ball on the pads, flicked towards backward square leg for a quick single
uses his feet and looks to go over mid-on but fails to middle, a single to deep midwicket
fuller around middle and leg, nudges it towards short midwicket
worked towards square leg for a single
flighted this time, Green comes down and looks to defend but is beaten as the ball spins sharply
flatter at 92.8kph. Just outside off, defended
fuller on the stumps, flicked but a diving stop by Rohit to his right at short midwicket
length ball around off, stands tall and punches it between extra cover and mid-off
length ball around off, stays in the crease and defends
short of length around off, drops it behind point for a quick single
length ball around fifth stump, Green was looking to block, gets a thick outside edge past the wide first slip
short of length around off, gets behind it and blocks
fuller around off, pushes it towards short midwicket from the front foot
length ball on middle and leg, finally manages to find a single, whipped towards deep midwicket
flatter around off, stays back and punches it towards the bowler
length ball, stays back and flicks it towards backward square leg
pitched up again, comes forward and pushes it towards short midwicket
fuller and quicker on the stumps, blocked
short of length outside off, arches back and chops it into the ground towards point
length ball around off, defended from the back foot
short of length around off, stays back and defends
short of length around middle and off, turned towards short midwicket
a touch fuller on middle and flicked, flicked but cannot beat short midwicket
length ball on middle and leg, misses the flick
fuller around off, pushes it towards covers
tossed up but too full, digs it out back

a big appeal for lbw Denied but India want to review this. Tossed up around off on a length, Smith came on the front foot to defend but missed as the ball turned. Was there an inside edge? No spike there and it hits the knee roll in the line of the stumps. Would have gone on to hit the leg stick. India find a wicket from nowehere. Smith isn't happy with himself
flatter around off, goes back and pushes it towards extra cover
length ball around off, defended on the front foot
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards covers
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller on the pads, flicked away, a partial stop by square leg. The lead is 300 now
straying down the leg side this time and Smith, who was standing just outside leg, clips it fine
length ball on middle and leg, tucked away towards fine leg
on the stumps, works it towards midwicket for an easy single
length ball around off, stays back and defends
flighted on middle and leg, cannot beat short leg who makes a tumbling stop to his right
pushed to the left of Ashwin, who fields it himself
tossed up on the stumps, defended
fuller and flatter down the leg side, tapped towards short fine leg
swept and swept hard. Was a touch fuller around off and Smith dispatches it to deep square leg
shortens his length after he sees Smith coming down, defended on the leg side
length ball around off, defended from the front foot
fuller on the stumps, waits in the crease before clipping it towards midwicket
length ball but slanting on to the pads, a leg glance this time as Australia make their intentions clear
short but the line is not right. On the leg stump and Smith punishes it, pulls it over fine leg, more of a top edge but the intention was always to hit it in the air
length ball around off, comes forward and pushes it towards mid-off gently for a quick single
starts with a length ball on middle and leg, defended
given some air, but drifts down leg and he flicks it to fine leg.
tossed up on off, defended
length on the stumps, he's trying to play it late, ends up tucking it to backward square leg
length outside off, he's staying well legside of the ball and on the back foot, ends up pushing it away into the offside
length outside off, cuts it to deep point
turn for Ashwin, as he pitches slightly short of a length on off, and Saha gathers it outside leg. Smith was looking to swat it away, missed

fuller, pushed to mid-off. He's looking for a single again, but there isn't one. Vihari at mid-off throws to the keeper, but the ball hits Green in the leg while he's turning back. Hand raised in apology from the fielder

big appeal as he's rapped on the pads. Rahane not interested in the review. Swinging into him, and Green is pushing forward at it, hit on the knee roll. But he got an inside edge onto pad there, which is why Rahane wasn't going to review it.
fuller, tailing into him outside off, comes forward nicely to meet it, pushing to cover
super shot. Full on off, and he shows the full face of the bat to off-drive peachily. Very straight, to mid-off's left and as soon as it was past him, it was heading to the boundary
length on the pads, flicked to square leg
fuller on off, driven to mid-on from the front foot
tossed up on the stumps, drifts in, Smith looking to work it away, gets a faint leading edge and the ball drops down near him
length on leg stump, flicked through backward square leg
fuller on the stumps, comes down the track to play it back to the bowler
fuller on off, defended from the crease

tossed up on a length on middle and leg, Smith goes right back and swats it towards fine leg. Came off the bottom half of the bat. Hit Saha's thigh pad I think - so technically that's a chance maybe. But not a chance realistically
flatter on the stumps, Smith skips down the track but blocks it back to the bowler
fullish on the stumps, moves across to tap to midwicket
length on middle and leg, tucked to midwicket
back of a length on off, defended solidly
length ball, nipping into him, keeps his bat straight to defend it. Gets it off the outside half, towards cover
fuller outside off, driven to cover
length outside off, pushed into the offside
fuller, outside leg, Smith goes to paddle-sweep it fine, but there is a short fine leg who stops it

length on the stumps, goes back and flat-bats it through midwicket. Smith is hustling for two, and excellent running gives them that. Green was going to the danger end, and even though the fielder fired in a good throw to Ashwin who whipped off the bails immediately, Green was in
room outside off so he clears his front leg and glides it through backward point
coming down the track, Ashwin shortens his length and Green defends it back
tossed up on the stumps, he's looking to flick it, gets it off the toe end back to the bowler
too full and outside leg, he sweeps it hard to backward square leg
thick edge bounces to gully. Length outside off, he was coming on the front foot to punch
length sliding down leg, moves inside the line and flicks it off his pads to deep square leg
fuller, ends up on the pads, clipped to mid-on. Green is looking for the single but sent back, which prompts the fielder to have a shy. Gathered by Saha
fuller, tailing into him a bit, comes on the front foot and drives to mid-off
nipping into him from back of a length outside off, but Green has been very sure in his defending from the crease
length on off, stands tall and punches to mid-on
goes back and glances this fine, placed well enough to get two with the fielder who is back having to make ground to his right
makes room to cut, but that's not short enough and he gets an under-edge that chops down on the ground
tossed up nicely on off, dipping on him, comes on the front foot and plays it back to the bowler with bat in front of pad
flatter, fired in quicker, Smith was skipping down the track, thumps it to midwicket but Rohit dives to his right to pull off a good save
tossed up on the stumps, comes on the front foot to work it to midwicket
length on middle and leg, turned to backward square leg
length outside off, defended to the bowler's right
back of a length outside off, rising up appreciably, he's coming on the front foot but has to adjust and defend it down towards gully
slower ball, interesting variation from Siraj. 115 kph. Floated up on off, but Green defends calmly
back of a length coming into him, rocks back to pull but can't middle it, gets an under-edge onto pad
length on off, pushed back towards the bowler
back of a length on the stumps, moves across to tap it towards mid-on
flatter, he's stepping out to it, manages to whip it off pad through midwicket
fuller on the stumps, defended
length outside off, punched back to the bowler
tossed up fuller, driven back to the bowler
tossed up a bit more, still attacking the stumps, defended again
length on the stumps, goes right back and defends
back of a length coming into him, tapped into the legside
length on off, pushed back gently towards the bowler
back of a length on off, Smith happy to keep defending those
length on off, defended from the crease
fuller on the stumps, blocked back towards the bowler
full on off stump, tapped towards cover
fuller on off, defended
length on leg stump, tries to flick it away but can't get enough bat on it, the ball just plops down near the short leg area
another short ball outside off, another authoritative pull shot from Smith. Makes good connection, to deep midwicket this time. There's a fielder back there though

they get an overthrow. Length on off, pushed towards cover and Green was setting off for a run that wasn't there. Sent back by Smith when he had gone almost halfway, the fielder has a shy that misses, so they get the run anyway
length on the stumps, gets behind it to defend
bouncer outside off, Smith in perfect control as he swivels to pull this to deep square leg and raise fifty. He's well and truly back
too full and Green will get some confidence from that shot. Came nicely forward to drive through cover. Hung in the air for a mite, but in the gap and timed well enough to go all the way
length on the stumps, patted back down the pitch
fuller on off, comes on the front foot to push, gets a thick inside edge. Gill at backward square leg in action again, dives to his left to stop the ball
length, coming into him on off, tapped into the offside
length on leg stump, tucked backward of square

popped in the air but didn't carry to Gill at backward square leg. Back of a length and Smith was pushing at it with hands in front of body, got it off the inside edge and it popped up in the air, but fell short of a diving Gill
length on off, pushed to point

edged past the lone slip. There is only one slip, standing wider than the normal first slip, Pujara there, but this was away from his outstretched diving hands to his right. Green pushed hard at a length ball in the channel and got the edge
length outside off, confidently on the front foot to block it
length on the stumps, tapped into the legside
past the outside edge. Coming in with the angle on a length, and Green pushes at it inside the line, the ball whizzes past the edge
length outside off, left alone

spat up off a length. That uneven bounce is going to be a handful as the game enters it's final stretch. This was on a length on off, and Smith had to get his hands up in a hurry to fend it down. Gets hit on the splice and has to take his bottom hand off the bat
good length on off, moves across to tap it towards midwicket
length ball slanting into him, moves inside the line to tuck it off thigh pad through backward square leg
fuller on a sixth stump line, he covers the line and shoulders arms
length on the stumps, pushed towards cover
leading edge falls short of point. Length ball tailing into him, Green wants to flick it away but closes the bat early and gets a leading edge
good length on the fourth stump, steered towards gully
length on off, moving across as always is Smith and he blocks it
kept a touch low that one, length on off, but he was nicely behind it and defended

oh that's just sublime from Smith. A rare bad ball from Bumrah, too full outside off, and Smith's batting in his bubble where a bad ball is a bad ball and needs to be put away in style. Hands through the ball as he strokes it through cover
length outside off angling into him, solidly defended towards cover
fuller on the stumps, patted back gently

he's poked it through to the keeper. Squared him up with the angle coming into him and the ball straightening a touch, got extra bounce too and Wade follows this back of length ball outside off with his hands. Tried to pull away but wasn't quick enough and feathers an edge for a straightforward catch to Saha. Some cheer for Saini now, in what has been a tough initiation to Test cricket
too full on the pads, easily flicked through midwicket. There is a man on the boundary, so it's just one
back of a length on off, defended back to the bowler

magnificent. Read the length early so was in position to punch this regally through cover. Didn't move feet, didn't have to, with room outside off and the ball short enough, and his eye ensuring he was perfectly balanced when meeting the ball
back of a length on a fourth stump line, punched to cover
length outside off, steered to the backward point area
fuller around off, lunges forward and blocks
length but well outside off once again, shouldered arms
length outside off, left alone
length ball around off, defended
fuller outside off, pushed towards extra cover
a thick outside edge as this one keeps straight. Smith was stuck on the back foot as well. A single past slip
short of length angling down, tucked away towards square leg
length ball in the channel. Left alone
another overpitched delivery, driven through extra cover this time, off the mark with a boundary
fuller again, punched towards mid-off this time
fuller around off and middle, defended on the leg side

caught down the leg side. A length ball angling down, Labuschagne goes for the glance but it's a touch away from him and he can manage only an edge and Saha dives full length to his left to pouch it with both hands
tossed up on the stumps, 82.8 kph, comes forward and blocks
uses his feet and flicks it through deep midwicket for a couple of runs
another reverse sweep, this time more of tap to place it past slip
pulls out the reverse sweep and hits it hard behind point for four, 100 of the stand also comes up
95.9kph, flatter around off, Labuschagne thrusts his bat at it
length ball on the pads, glanced towards short fine leg
fuller around off, a big stride forward and blocked
fuller around off, once again staying inside the line of the ball. Pushed towards covers
length ball outside off, stays beside the line of the ball and defends it towards point
length ball around off, stays back and defends it towards covers
length ball outside off, driven on the up through covers, Agarwal puts in the chase and a desperate drive near the boundary to pull it back
length ball angling in towards the off stump, defended
length ball on the stumps, stays back and turns it towards short leg once again
full outside off, defended towards short leg with soft hands
fuller on the pads, tucked away towards fine leg
fuller, just outside off, swept towards deep square leg
length ball at the stumps, backs away and pushes it towards extra cover
flatter and quicker on a length around off, defended carefully
length ball around off, Smith goes back and across and flicks it towards square leg
length again, coming in towards the batsman, defended from the inside half of the bat
132.2kph, length ball outside off, coming in with the angle, Smith was looking to drive on the up and gets beaten on the inside edge
short of length outside off, gets on the top of it and turns it to the leg side
length ball outside off, defended comfortably
short of length outside off, worked behind point, Rahane puts in the slide to keep it to one
length around off and spinning in, turns it towards square leg
flatter and quicker around off, defended from the back foot
length ball on the stumps, blocked
a shimmy down the ground to defend this leg-stump delivery
length ball at the stumps, backs away and forces it towards extra cover
fuller on the stumps, uses his feet to push it towards short midwicket
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
short again, pulled this time towards fine leg for a single
bouncer but once again the line is not good. Down the leg side, Smith evades it comfortably
length ball at the stumps, Smith is behind this and blocks
length ball on the pads, flicked towards square leg
short of length outside off, defended
lunges forward and defends this flighted delivery
tossed up around off, uses his feet and lofts it through the gap between the bowler and the mid-off
length ball on the pads once again, another single to square leg
uses his feet and pushes it towards mid-on, all along the ground
length ball spinning on to the pads, turns it towards square leg
length ball on the pads, flicked, was in the air for a while. Rohit makes a good stop to his right at short midwicket
an attempted bouncer but well down the leg side, he is happy to let it go
length ball on the pads, tucked away behind square leg
length ball around off, stays back and flicks it towards square leg
fuller on the pads and whipped towards deep square leg, fielder there
fuller around off, drives it towards extra cover from the back foot
length ball around off, stays on the crease and defends
tossed up outside off, looks to poke at it. Gets a thick outside edge into the ground. Dribbles past Rahane at slip
flighted around off, comes forward and pushes it on the leg side
flatter outside off, 91.8kph. Goes for the paddle sweep and misses. Gets hit on the pads. An appeal for lbw but the impact was outside off
length ball around off, some turn there. works it towards short midwicket
flatter around off, stays back and defends
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards backward square leg
a short one outside off, looks to pull initially before deciding to duck
length ball around off, a bit of shuffle and defended
too full outside off and driven past the bowler, a desperate dive from Siraj doesn't help and the ball beats the mid-off for four
length ball outside off, pushes it towards extra cover and sets off for a quick single
length ball angling in, stays in his crease and blocks
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards square leg
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
length ball, just outside off, defended towards mid-on
length ball around off, stays in the crease and offers another block
pitched up around off once again, a strong front-foot defence again from Labuschagne
fuller around off, half a step forward and defended
fuller around off, 132.5kph, tucked away towards short midwicket
length ball around off, Smith is behind it and blocks again
fuller around off, stays in the crease and defends
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards fine leg for a single
a touch shorter this time, defended from the back foot
beaten outside off. A legcutter from Siraj, pitching outside off and leaving the batsman. Was around fifth stump, Labuschagne went to defend it and was beaten
fuller around off, comes on the front foot and defends it under his eyes
fuller around off, keeps a touch low. Smith was stuck in the crease but does well to bring his bat down in time
length ball around off, goes for the flick but misses. Gets struck high on the thigh
length ball around off, closes the face of the bat to turn it towards square leg
fifty for Labuschagne. Fuller around off, punches it towards mid-on for a quick single
length ball outside off, Labuschagne pushes at it and gets beaten
fuller around off, comes forward and defends it towards mid-on
nipping back in sharply from a length to catch Labuschagne by surprise, he does well though to glance it towards fine leg
length around off once again, stays back and punches it towards extra cover
length ball around off, blocked this time
length ball at the stumps, Labuschagne misses the flick and is hit on the thigh, very high. A loud appeal for lbw, mainly by the bowler but that was going over
length ball on the stumps, defended towards mid-on
length ball on the pads, flicked and Vihari makes a good stop, sliding to his right
straighter, a length ball on middle and leg, turned away towards backward square leg
length around off, defended on the off side this time
a touch fuller around fourth stump, Smith is watchful and defends it down the wicket. Gestures that it just straightened
length ball on the pads, flicked but straight towards square leg
length ball around fourth stump, blocked again
length ball around off, defended from the crease
length ball around off, stays back and defended with a straight bat
length ball down the leg side, flicked towards square leg, a good sliding stop there
length on middle and leg, flicked towards fine leg
length around middle and leg, tucked away towards short midwicket
length ball down the leg side, left alone
length ball around off, stays back and defends
length around off, shuffles and glances it towards fine leg
length outside off again, gets behind it and blocks
once again a length ball, just outside off, turned towards short midwicket
length ball around off, Smith shuffles and blocks

Vihari has dropped a regulation catch at square leg. Length ball on middle and leg, Labuschagne went for the flick but couldn't keep it down, A simple catch but put down. Was knee height and it hits him on the wrist
fuller around off, works it towards mid-on with the wrists
goes for the yorker but it's a low full toss, and clipped to mid on for one
a little full, Labuschagne flicks it with a roll of his wrists and finds the gap despite a packed leg side field for his sixth four. On 46 now
on off and middle, Labuschagne keeps his head down and blocks
back of length outside off, punched away to deep cover for one
goes for the off stump line, Smith blocks it away
down the leg side fo a change and it goes past Smith's pads
around off, straight bat and defended to leg yet again
around the off stump line again, and Labuschagne works this to midwicket
on length on off, straight bat from Labuschagne to defend it to leg
128.3kmh, this bowling is getting slower. Outside off again, and he defends it back again
Labuschagne plays a bit early this time while trying to flick the ball to leg, gets a thick outside edge back to Siraj
targets the stumps, Labuschagne covers the line and helps it to leg
outside off and a rare delivery left alone
nips it in a little bit towards the stumps, Smith covers the stumps and blocks again
bangs this one in a little short, and Smith defends it down the ground
too full this time and driven to cover for a quick single
back of length outside off, he punches it into the covers
misses this one while trying to work the back of length ball to leg and is struck high on the pad
shuffles across and clips the ball past midwicket for two, might have been a misfield there, and Smith comes back
fullish at 131kmh outside off, driven into the covers with hard hands
looked like an offcutter from outside off, Smith watches it carefully and blocks
shuffles across to expose the leg stump, and clips the ball to leg
nipping it in from outside off, goes on the back foot and blocks it
outside off, the big drive from Smith but he finds cover this time
he aims for the stumps and it's worked to the leg side for one more
outside off on length this time, Smith defends easily

bowler_batsman: Saini to Smith, (no ball) FOUR runs
commentary: too full, hint of room, and Smith dispatches that to the cover boundary with an expansive cover drive
stays back again for the ball and defends with a dead bat
138kmh, pulls the length back a little bit, Smith stays back and defends with a straight bat
136.1kmh, tight line and length outside off, he defends it on off
around middle and he works it to leg for one
133kmh, on length outside off and it's blocked easily
moves the line to middle and leg stump, and Smith helps it to midwicket
just a bit of extra bounce again outside off, Smith taken by surprise while defending on off
a little too straight for Labuschagne who flicks with his wrist and Ashwin gives it a chase but they take three
touch fuller outside off and he drives it comfortably on off
walks across a little bit this time and punches it down
132kmh, beaten outside off. Siraj bowls it on length a bit outside off, Labuschagne pokes and misses
keeps a little low as it head towards off, Smith offers the straight bat as usual
on middle and leg, tucked to midwicket by closing the face of the bat
length delivery again on the stumps, Smith covers the line yet again and blocks it back
back to the off stump line and Smith pushes it down again
beats him outside off! 135.5 kmh this time, just a touch wider outside off, Smith hangs his bat out and the ball holds its line to miss the outside edge
on the stumps at 134kmh, Smith covers the stumps and defends to mid on
straight delivery on off, driven down the ground and Ashwin puts in another dive from mid on to save more runs
bit straighter now and Labuschagne defends it down the ground
goes across and nudges the ball to fine leg for one more
straighter this time around off, driven down the ground with a straight bat and this time Ashwin dives to his left from mid on to save a few
towards the pads now and it's helped along to leg for one
too full, driven handsomely and Saini dives to his left at cover to save four
hint of extra bounce surprises Smith a bit outside off as he defends
a little wider again and this time Smith pounces on it with a cover drive that's middled from the bat for the big gap in the covers
touch wider outside off, Smith defends off the back foot again
stays back in the crease again, and helps this along to midwicket
towards off stump again, Smith covers his stumps and pushes it to mid on
this length ball keeps a bit low while heading towards off stump, Smith does well to defend it back
nicely tossed up on off at 79.6kmh, makes the batsman wait and he helps it to leg with the turn
wide outside off again, Smith goes back and punches that nicely in the gap on the off side for two
leans into the ball this time and flicks it to leg
comes forward this time and drives the fuller ball back to Ashwin
bit wide and short, it turns in and he punches it to mid off
pushes this on the off side for a single
Smith stays back and waits for the ball before defending it back
goes towards the pads this time and Smith helps it along to fine leg for two
slower one at 123kmh, it waits on Smith a bit before he drives it down to mid off
on the pads, Smith nudges it to midwicket and decides against the single
slightly straighter around off stump, Smith goes across and defends it down the ground
135kmh, targets the stumps from just outside off, he defends it to leg
tossed up from Ashwin outside off, he leans forward and pushes it down to long on
charges down the track, goes for a big swing and he drives that almost inside-out to the long-off boundary for four
turning into him and this time he nudges it to deep midwicket for one
Ashwin slows it down, Labuschagne waits and then defends it back
brings out the sweep and finds the fielder behind square on leg
goes across a bit and works the ball with the turn to leg
towards middle and leg, and flicked to square leg this time
back to outside off, this time driven on the up a little bit to point
on the pads this time, he flicks it away just behind square and beats the packed leg-side field for four
no movement, 132 kmh, he stays back and punches the ball to cover
touch shorter and around off stump, he defends off the back foot
good length ball towards the stumps, Labuschagne defends it to leg
forward lean and blocked on the leg side
comes out of the crease, Ashwin slows it down and the batsman works it to leg for one
bit quicker and he defends it back
beats him! Labuschagne lunges forward for the off break outside off, it turns a long way and hits him on the pad but was probably hitting him outside off
flighted around off at 85.5kmh, Smith leans into it and drives to long-on
works this ball with the turn to the leg side for one
short on off this time, he slices it to deep point and keeps strike again. Lead over 150 now
too short, Labuschagne gets on top of it with a pivot on the back foot and pulls it away with style for four behind square
angling into the stumps for Smith, he goes across and works this wide of mid on
closer to the stumps and this time it's steered to deep point
just short of gully! Outside off, Labuschagne pushes at it away from the body for a thick edge, Rahane dives to his left with both hands but it doesn't carry
targets the stumps with a good-length delivery, he defends it to leg
short and wide for the second time this over and this time Labuschagne cuts it wide of point for three
more flight and closer to the stumps, he straight bats it towards mid on
shouts of "catch it" as Smith also goes back and nudges the ball with the turn off the pads for one
turning in towards the stumps now, he goes back and tucks it to deep midwicket
too short and wide, he cuts and finds the fielder
slow full toss at 84.6kmh, Labuschagne sweeps that away in the gap on the leg side for a four
length on off, turned to midwicket.
fuller on off, defended to cover
length on off, turned to backward square leg by closing the bat face. He's overstepped though, so that's a no-ball
low bounce again. Back of a length and Smith was looking to pull that into oblivion but the ball sneaks under bat to thud into his thigh pad
length on off, defended
length ball defended back to the bowler
back of a length outside off, straightens a touch, jabbed towards backward point. Got it higher on the bat, with the bounce a touch more than he expected
turn for Ashwin. Marnus was making room to punch but it spins sharply into him and he ends up softly patting it towards silly point
length outside off, punched back to the bowler
goes back to this and opens the face to half-edge and half-steer it through gully
tossed up a bit fuller, and Smith pushes it gently. The fielder at mid-on who is almost beside the non-striker gathers
lovely bowling, nice loop on a length and turning  in from off, Smith defends

muted appeal, but I think that's sliding down leg. Ashwin is convinced and he has convinced Rahane to take a review. This was tossed up on leg stump, Smith went for a hard slog-sweep and missed it, beaten by the loop, but the ball pitched and was turning into him. Surely sliding down. And after a delay with Hawkeye, we finally confirm that was missing leg stump. In fact it was just clipping, so India get to hang on to their review.
length on the stumps, clipped to midwicket
beaten. Goes for the drive to a length ball that's nipping in outside off, and doesn't connect
full on the pads, picked off his feet to square leg
back of a length on off, clips it towards midwicket off the back foot
length on off, stays on the back foot and whips to square leg
back of a length on off, defended down the pitch
down the track again but almost beaten in flight. Had to adjust with the loop and drift and ended up pushing it into the legside
dances down the track and gets to the pitch to drive through mid-on
fuller, uses wrists to turn it through square leg, staying back in his crease
goes back and whips this through midwicket

he's trapped him lbw but Warner wants to review this, almost immediately. Was floated up on a length and going straight on, Warner went for the slog-sweep. The ball wasn't full enough for it, so he misses it entirely and is struck on the back leg. Hawkeye says umpire's call on impact, so Warner will have to be on his way. Ashwin has had the wood over him historically, and does it again.
fuller, comes on the front foot to defend
full and wide outside off, he goes for the drive and connects smoothly. There is a sweeper back though, so he mops up
room outside off again, and on the shorter side, stays beside it and punches through point
length coming into him on off, defended towards mid-on
magnificent and disdainful. Bit of a gift, short and wide outside off, but he deals with it in a manner so pleasing to the eye. Stands tall and slaps it through cover with superb timing
short ball outside off, thought about pulling but decided against it, so wafted the bat over the ball to ensure he wouldn't touch it
fullish, angling into him, tucked through midwicket
angling in on off, fuller ball, defended
fuller on leg stump, flicked off his pads to square leg
length outside off, pushed into the offside
length outside off, defended
rocks back to this short ball and pulls with authority through square leg. Nicely transferred weight back and swivelled to generate power while also controlling it
full on off, defended back. Siraj has a shy at the striker's end, except the ball is nowhere near the stumps. Saha jumps up to collect and prevent an embarrassing four overthrows
shot. Gets a bit of margin and makes it count. A mite too full outside off and he's on that front foot to punch through cover
homing in on that off stump is Bumrah, but Warner's moving confidently now. On the front foot to defend solidly
length on off, coming into him, defended
back of a length outside off, cuts it forcefully but straight to cover
length outside off, punched to cover
tired the yorker I think but missed it narrowly, which allowed Warner to on-drive beautifully, to the long-on fence
full on the pads, and he turns it, using wrists, to get off the mark with a brace through midwicket

gets the outside edge. Superb ball, not much Pucovski could do. Banged in on a hard length and gets it to move appreciably away. Pucovski shaping to defend but the ball kisses the outside edge and Saha dives to his right to hold on.
fuller outside off, defended to cover
length on the stumps, closes the bat face while keeping it near his body to get  a couple through midwicket
back of a length, goes to pull but that maybe another one that didn't bounce as expected. Goes under his bat and he cops it on the midriff
length on off stump, shuffles across from his guard outside leg to be in line with the ball to defend it
sharp bouncer to end, Warner goes all Matrix in arching his back to let it pass over him
length coming into him, ends up on the pads, tucked to square leg
clipped to midwicket
length outside off, Warner looks a bit tentative, because this one kept a mite low too. steers it towards the slips.
full on the stumps, turned off his toes to fine leg
length ball coming in on off, pushes at it, gets a thick inside edge to square leg
length on the stumps, he was on the back foot a bit, and almost fell over while clipping it through midwicket on the back foot
rides the bounce nicely to punch through point. Shorter ball, outside off, Warner stays beside the ball and times it well
fuller, going across him, lands outside off and going further away
length, going across him, stays in his crease and punches to cover
fuller outside off, driven to cover on the front foot
that one kept low.  Length ball outside off, it's a brand new ball, should have been zipping through but it scoots at just above ankle height.
length, closer to off, bat close to body as he defends to cover
length outside off, defended to cover
fuller on off, comes on the front foot to defend
cracking shot. Too short outside off, doesn't really rise, so he has the room and length to essay a superb backfoot punch through cover
length on the stumps, defended on the front foot
fuller on off, defended towards mid-on
fuller, tapped to mid-off

good bowling, after bringing them in, he jags this one away, going across Warner, who was coming forward to defend and can't stop his hands from a tiny movement following the ball. Movement is enough to elude the edge
fuller, defended back down the pitch
hurried him a bit, coming into him from a length and he jabs at it from the crease, keeping it out
back of a length outside off, pushed into the offside
on target, attacking the stumps and hitting a good length, defended from the crease

bouncer, and dealt with superbly by the debutant. Climbs on an offstump line but he gets into good position to pull this to deep midwicket with authority. The momentum of the swivel made him lose balance and fall down, but after the shot had been hit. There was no need to run anyway
this one nips back in from outside off, and Pucovski defends solidly
good length on off, defended into the offside
moving away again outside off, and he shoulders arms again
length on a fifth stump line and moving away, left alone
length on the pads and glanced to fine leg to get off the mark straightaway. Oh that came off the pad, so it's a leg bye. Warner not of the mark yet
